channel.title: I need help i can't play on A 508
channel.description:
[b][u]Hello everyone,[/u][/b]
My problem is that every time I run the client it loads and the it get stuck at connecting update server... I have the 508 cache but still I have that problem now I have Deleted the 508 cache and was wondering if some one here could help me.
Thank you very much for your time and I hope some one can help me.
Greatings
Metalic M4ge

item.title: I need help i can't play on A 508
item.dc:creator: @Metalic_M4ge Metalic M4ge
item.description:
@Metalic_M4ge wrote:

im not playing on my own server im playing on primadude’s server…

Off topic Does some one have a good working compli’er for me ?

Read full topic

item.title: I need help i can't play on A 508
item.dc:creator: @pkn00b pkn00b
item.description:
@pkn00b wrote:

You allways have to start the server before starting the client.
And you have to add “127.0.0.1” or it wont work eather.

Read full topic
